formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: A FUNCTION NOT FOUND occurs with the following message:

listitem.screen: Fix[8] ns←nms ModToNS mod ⍝ Namespace to return

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: This error reveals a number of issues.

listitem.para: The LiftFuncs function was not properly lifting top level functions.
There was an incorrect test in the generation that caused generation not to occur in certain cases.
The handling of empty modules had to be reworked again to make it more flexible since we cannot control the fill argument of the incoming data well enough.

In the end, the difficulty of getting the JIT compiler to work correctly stil causes unacceptable delays in moving forward, and this requires that we adjust our increment plans and delay, once again, the treatment of JIT.
